feast_ready.speaker: Narrator
feast_ready.text: After much preparation, you've finally recreated the Wanderer's Feast. Marcus sits at his usual table, waiting.

serve_dish.speaker: Narrator
serve_dish.text: You place the steaming dish before him. The aroma fills the cafe with the scent of adventure and nostalgia.

marcus_reaction.speaker: Marcus
marcus_reaction.text: *He takes a bite, and his eyes well with tears* This is it. Exactly as I remember it.

marcus_memory.speaker: Marcus
marcus_memory.text: We ate this the night before the raid. Everyone laughing, telling stories... not knowing what tomorrow would bring.

choices.text: Those memories deserve to be honored.
Perhaps it's time to create new memories.

honor_memories.speaker: Marcus
honor_memories.text: *He nods slowly* You're right. I've been running from them instead of carrying them with me.

new_memories.speaker: Marcus
new_memories.text: *He smiles through his tears* New memories... yes. Perhaps starting right here, in this cafe.

marcus_decision.speaker: Marcus
marcus_decision.text: I've made my decision. I'm done wandering. I want to stay here, help this cafe grow. If you'll have me.

resolution.speaker: Narrator
resolution.text: Marcus has found his peace. He'll remain at Dragon Haven as a friend and ally, his wandering days finally at an end.
